verses.name: Matthew 26:31
verses.text: Then saith Jesus unto them, All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad.

verses.name: Matthew 26:32
verses.text: But after I am risen again, I will go before you into Galilee.

verses.name: Matthew 26:33
verses.text: Peter answered and said unto him, Though all men shall be offended because of thee, yet will I never be offended.

verses.name: Matthew 26:34
verses.text: Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, That this night, before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice.
